verses.roman:
saṅkṣepe kahila mahāprabhura bhakta-gaṇa
samagra balite nāre 'sahasra-vadana'

synonyms: saṅkṣepe—in brief; kahila—described; mahāprabhura—of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bhakta-gaṇa—the devotees; samagra—all; balite—to speak; nāre—cannot; sahasra-vadana—Lord Śeṣa, who has thousands of mouths.
translation: I have briefly described the devotees of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu in different places. Even Lord Śeṣa, who has thousands of mouths, could not list them all.
